SEARCH
Package com.group7.krisefikser.service.item

Class StorageItemService

java.lang.Object
com.group7.krisefikser.service.item.StorageItemService
@Service public class StorageItemService extends Object
This class is a service for managing storage items. It provides methods to get, add, update, delete, sort and filter storage items. It uses StorageItemRepo to interact with the database.

  • Constructor Details

    • StorageItemService

      public StorageItemService()

  • Method Details

    • getAllStorageItems

      public List<StorageItem> getAllStorageItems(int householdId)
      Retrieves all storage items for a specific household from the repository.
      Parameters:
      householdId - The ID of the household to retrieve storage items for.
      Returns:
      A list of all storage items available for the specified household.

    • getSharedStorageItemsInGroup

      public List<AggregatedStorageItemResponse> getSharedStorageItemsInGroup(List<String> itemTypesString, StorageItemSortRequest sortRequest)
      Retrieves all shared storage items for a specific group from the repository. Using the group ID for the current user, it fetches all storage items that are marked as shared.
      Returns:
      A list of all shared storage items available for the specified group.

    • getStorageItemsByItemId

      public List<StorageItem> getStorageItemsByItemId(int itemId, int householdId)
      Retrieves storage items by their item ID for a specific household.
      Parameters:
      itemId - The item ID of the storage items to retrieve.
      householdId - The ID of the household the storage items belong to.
      Returns:
      A list of storage items of the specified item.

    • getSharedStorageItemsInGroupByItemId

      public List<StorageItemGroupResponse> getSharedStorageItemsInGroupByItemId(int itemId)
      Retrieves all storage items for a specific group ID and item ID.
      Parameters:
      itemId - The itemID of the items to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The storage item with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • addStorageItem

      public StorageItem addStorageItem(StorageItem storageItem)
      Adds a new storage item to the repository after validating it. This method ensures that the item meets all validation criteria before delegating the addition to the repository.
      Parameters:
      storageItem - The storage item to be added.
      Returns:
      The added storage item with its generated ID.

    • updateStorageItem

      public StorageItem updateStorageItem(int id, int householdId, StorageItem storageItem)
      Updates an existing storage item in the repository after validating it. This method ensures that the item meets all validation criteria before delegating the update to the repository.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the storage item to be updated.
      householdId - The ID of the household the storage item belongs to.
      storageItem - The updated storage item details.
      Returns:
      The updated storage item.

    • updateSharedStorageItem

      public StorageItemResponse updateSharedStorageItem(int id, StorageItemRequest request)
      Updates a shared storage item from the request. This method checks if the item is shared and if the user belongs to the same group before allowing the update.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the storage item to be updated.
      request - The request containing the updated storage item details.
      Returns:
      The updated storage item response.

    • deleteStorageItem

      public void deleteStorageItem(int id, int householdId)
      Deletes a storage item from the repository by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the storage item to be deleted.
      householdId - The ID of the household the storage item belongs to.

    • getExpiringStorageItems

      public List<StorageItem> getExpiringStorageItems(int days, int householdId)
      Retrieves storage items that are about to expire for a specific household.
      Parameters:
      days - The number of days within which items will expire.
      householdId - The ID of the household to retrieve expiring items for.
      Returns:
      A list of storage items that will expire within the specified number of days.

    • storageItemExists

      public boolean storageItemExists(int id, int householdId)
      Checks if a storage item exists in the repository by its ID for a specific household.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the storage item to check.
      householdId - The ID of the household the storage item belongs to.
      Returns:
      true if the storage item exists, false otherwise.

    • convertToStorageItemResponse

      public StorageItemResponse convertToStorageItemResponse(StorageItem storageItem)
      Converts a single StorageItem entity to a StorageItemResponse DTO with item details.
      Parameters:
      storageItem - The StorageItem entity
      Returns:
      A StorageItemResponse with item details

    • convertToStorageItemResponses

      public List<StorageItemResponse> convertToStorageItemResponses(List<StorageItem> storageItems)
      Converts a list of StorageItem entities to StorageItemResponse DTOs.
      Parameters:
      storageItems - The list of StorageItem entities
      Returns:
      A list of StorageItemResponse DTOs

    • addStorageItemFromRequest

      public StorageItemResponse addStorageItemFromRequest(int householdId, StorageItemRequest request)
      Adds a new storage item based on the provided request DTO.
      Parameters:
      householdId - The household ID to assign to the new storage item
      request - The request containing the storage item details
      Returns:
      The response DTO for the created storage item

    • updateStorageItemFromRequest

      public StorageItemResponse updateStorageItemFromRequest(int id, int householdId, StorageItemRequest request)
      Updates an existing storage item based on the provided request DTO.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the storage item to update
      householdId - The household ID the storage item belongs to
      request - The request containing the updated storage item details
      Returns:
      The response DTO for the updated storage item

    • getAggregatedStorageItems

      public List<AggregatedStorageItemResponse> getAggregatedStorageItems(int householdId)
      Aggregates storage items by item ID for a specific household.
      Parameters:
      householdId - The ID of the household
      Returns:
      A list of aggregated storage item responses

    • getAggregatedStorageItems

      public List<AggregatedStorageItemResponse> getAggregatedStorageItems(int householdId, String sortBy, String sortDirection)
      Aggregates storage items by item ID for a specific household, with optional sorting.
      Parameters:
      householdId - The ID of the household
      sortBy - The field to sort by (e.g., "quantity", "expirationDate", "name")
      sortDirection - The direction of sorting (e.g., "asc" or "desc")
      Returns:
      A list of aggregated storage item responses

    • aggregateStorageItems

      public List<AggregatedStorageItemResponse> aggregateStorageItems(List<StorageItem> storageItems, String sortBy, String sortDirection)
      Aggregates storage items by item ID and creates a list of aggregated responses.
      Parameters:
      storageItems - The list of all storage items
      sortBy - The field to sort by (e.g., "quantity", "expirationDate", "name")
      sortDirection - The direction of sorting (e.g., "asc" or "desc")
      Returns:
      A list of aggregated storage item responses

    • getFilteredAndSortedAggregatedItems

      public List<AggregatedStorageItemResponse> getFilteredAndSortedAggregatedItems(int householdId, List<ItemType> itemTypes, String sortBy, String sortDirection)
      Aggregates storage items by item ID for a specific household, with optional filtering and sorting.
      Parameters:
      householdId - The ID of the household
      itemTypes - The item types to filter by
      sortBy - The field to sort by
      sortDirection - The direction of sorting
      Returns:
      A list of filtered and sorted aggregated storage item responses

    • searchAggregatedStorageItems

      public List<AggregatedStorageItemResponse> searchAggregatedStorageItems(int householdId, String searchTerm, List<ItemType> itemTypes, String sortBy, String sortDirection)
      Searches for aggregated storage items by item name and/or type.
      Parameters:
      householdId - The ID of the household
      searchTerm - The search term to match against item names (can be null)
      itemTypes - The item types to filter by (can be null or empty)
      sortBy - The field to sort by (can be null)
      sortDirection - The direction of sorting (can be null)
      Returns:
      A list of matching aggregated storage item responses

    • updateStorageItemSharedStatus

      @Transactional public List<StorageItemResponse> updateStorageItemSharedStatus(int id, long householdId, ChangeStorageItemSharedStatusRequest request)
      Changes the shared status of a storage item and updates its quantity. If the quantity is changed, a new storage item is created with the updated quantity.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the storage item to update
      request - The request containing the new shared status and quantity
      Returns:
      A list of updated storage item responses
